sentences.sContent: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.sCn: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.sContent: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.sCn: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.sContent: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.sCn: 月底之前必须递交申请。

sentences.sContent: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.sCn: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.sContent: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.sCn: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.sContent: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.sCn: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.sContent: Thank you for your letter of application , which we received yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

sentences.sContent: ...Higher fossil fuel prices prove to be conducive to innovation and application of cleaner technology...
...The application of a technology can impact areas beyond itself...
...A job application might mention affiliations with groups such as the "Wisconsin Association of African-American Lawyers" or the "National Black Employees Association"...
...Nearly all application materials are submitted online...
...But in the world of the application essay...
...I'll just go get that history paper I did last year on the Roman Empire and turn it into a first-person application essay!...
...Although the application essay causes lots of anxiety...
...The production and application of fertilizers and pesticides account for the largest part of energy use in the modern industrialised agricultural process...

...In the modern industrialised agricultural process-which developing nations are moving towards in order to increase future yields-energy usage in the making and application of fertilizers and pesticides represents the single biggest component...

synos.tran: 应用；申请；应用程序；[药]敷用

phrases.pCn: 现场应用；野外使用；预涂涂装

words.tran: 可适用的；可应用的；合适的
适用的；有用的；可应用的

trans.tranCn: 申请， 申请书； 施用， 涂抹； 应用， 实施； 实用性
trans.tranOther: a formal, usually written, request for something such as a job, place at university, or permission to do something
